name: ABC
text:
Check the pollster’s track record.
Pay attention to the margin of error.
Heed averages, not outliers.

More tips on reading polls, via @FiveThirtyEight: https://t.co/MGgUGK5Qdm

name: ABC
text: Last week, a study in the U.K. found that dexamethasone, a common steroid, increased survival in severely ill COVID-19 patients who needed help breathing. https://t.co/6Jqbcd97kK

name: ABC
text: Mexico City’s main wholesale market detects dozens of coronavirus cases every week. https://t.co/QOifFTFSMO

name: ABC
text:
In 2016, Pres. Trump won the Electoral College despite losing the national popular vote. But if Biden wins the popular vote in November by 9.6 points—his current lead—Trump would be extremely unlikely to pull off the same trick.

Via @FiveThirtyEight: https://t.co/4EBerg9Cn5

name: ABC
text: Supporters celebrated after Serebrennikov received a suspended sentence. https://t.co/jPFmdgRLNc

text: READY FOR MY CLOSE UP: An underwater photographer diving off Mornington Peninsula in Australia got a stunning photo op with a broadnose sevengill shark. https://t.co/uidztZlqWQ https://t.co/zKiE219RZV

text: New York City's iconic Stonewall Inn, the birthplace of the modern-day LGBTQ rights movement, is facing an uncertain future and asking the community for help. https://t.co/QEhp3L0xI1

name: ABC
text: The world’s largest statisticians group added to a chorus of criticism this week against the recent hiring of two political appointees at the U.S. Census Bureau. https://t.co/CLXKHBdHzT
